meanings.definition: In a beautiful or attractive manner.
meanings.sent1: The flowers bloomed gorgeously in the garden.
meanings.sent2: She sang gorgeously at the talent show.
meanings.sent3: The cat stretched gorgeously after a long nap.
meanings.sent4: The sun set gorgeously over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The rainbow appeared gorgeously after the rainstorm.

meanings.definition: Very pleasing or delightful in appearance.
meanings.sent1: She wore a gorgeously colorful dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The painting was gorgeously framed in gold.
meanings.sent3: The cake was gorgeously decorated with icing flowers.
meanings.sent4: The mansion was gorgeously adorned with intricate carvings.
meanings.sent5: The peacock displayed its gorgeously vibrant feathers.
